arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso self-critical after Kiel draw: "We didn't have the right mentality"
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso was disappointed to see his Leverkusen side held to a draw by Holstein Kiel, saying his players didn't show the right mentality.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel secure memorable draw from 2-0 down away at Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Victor Boniface opened the scoring inside four minutes with a clinical finish, slotting the ball through goalkeeper Timon Weiner's legs after a slick pass from birthday boy Exequiel Palacios . Jonas Hofmann and Exequiel Palacios celebrate Leverkusen's second goal.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Union Berlin upset Dortmund, Leverkusen drop points against Kiel
arts.sum: Two eminently surprising results in the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs saw both Borussia Dortmund and defending champs Bayer 04 Leverkusen drop points against underdog opponents. Nuri Sahin's BVB headed to the capital city to take on the league's worst offense, 1. FC Union Berlin. Bo Svensson's FCU pulled off the shock 2-1 upset. Leverkusen, meanwhile, could only draw promoted Kiel. Freiburg and Wolfsburg were victorious in the other two concurrent kickoffs, picking up away wins against respective opponents VfL Bochum and SV Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Predicted Bayer Leverkusen XI vs Holsteinn Kiel
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to go top of the table, at least for the night, as they host Holstein Kiel after their 1-0 win against AC Milan in midweek. Head…

arts.ttl: Power Rankings: The best teams in Europe
arts.sum: Real Madrid's shock defeat to LOSC Lille and Bayern Munich's equally shocking 1-0 defeat to Aston Villa grabbed most of the column space, while some was also saved for Juventus's dramatic win over RB Leipzig too. Borussia Dortmund earn a spot in the rankings this week thanks to their thumping 7-1 win over an in-form Celtic side in the Champions League in midweek.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Bundesliga predictions including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Holstein Kiel.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso ‘proud’ of his time at Bayer Leverkusen ahead of 100th game
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso will take charge of his 100th game when Bayer Leverkusen host Holstein Kiel in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. It’s the Spaniard’s first managerial role at the highest…

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso discusses possible changes for Leverkusen against Kiel
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso has confirmed that he's considering making changes to his side for Saturday's Bundesliga clash with Holstein Kiel.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs Holstein Kiel preview: Champions to get back to winning ways?
arts.sum: Reigning Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen continue their title defence on Saturday as they host struggling Holstein Kiel at the BayArena for their sixth league game of the season.

arts.ttl: Preview: Bayer Leverkusen vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Bayer Leverkusen and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
